Vps_FrameParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Common Data Types and macros

Structure for setting the frame parameters like frame height, width, pitch and memory type. More...

#include <vps_dataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 width

UInt32 dataFormat
 

Detailed Description

Structure for setting the frame parameters like frame height, width, pitch and memory type.

struct Vps_FrameParams

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_FrameParams::dataFormat

Frame data Format. For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

UInt32 Vps_FrameParams::height

Height of frame in lines.

UInt32 Vps_FrameParams::memType

VPDMA memory type - Tiled buffer or normal non-tiled buffer. For valid values see Vps_VpdmaMemoryType.

UInt32 Vps_FrameParams::pitch[FVID2_MAX_PLANES]

Pitch for each planes in bytes. Only required planes needs to be populated.

UInt32 Vps_FrameParams::width

Width of frame in pixels.
